knimeNode.name: VCFMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Combines VCF records from different sources.

fullDescription.intro: Combines VCF records from different sources using GATK's CombineVariants. The tool reads in variant records from separate ROD (Reference-Ordered Data) sources and combines them into a single VCF. For further information, see the GATK documentation.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set path GenomeAnalysisTK.jar and memory usage.
Coverage analysis can be restricted to genomic regions defined in a BED file.

tab.name: CombineVariants options
tab.option: It is possible to add input VCF files one by one by setting the path to each VCF file or by adding all files in a folder that match the given regular expression (regex).
The file list shows the files that are going to be merged. It is possible to select some files and remove them from the list.

UNIQUIFY: Make all sample genotypes unique by file. Each sample shared across RODs gets named sample.ROD.
UNSORTED: Take the genotypes in any order.
REQUIRE_UNIQUE: Require that all samples/genotypes be unique between all inputs.
Set a folder were the merged VCF file is stored.

ports.outPort: Path to the merged VCF file.
